duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide quick and friendly service to all customers while working as a part of the restaurant team.
Process customer orders efficiently and accurately, including payment processing.
Maintain cleanliness by cleaning tables, floors, and other areas of the restaurant.
Follow proper safety procedures when handling and preparing food.
Ability to lift, carry, push, or pull heavy objects up to 50 pounds and perform other physical tasks such as kneeling, bending, and reaching.
Show up to scheduled shifts on time and work under pressure at a fast pace.
Work as a team, assisting other crewmembers in completing tasks to ensure continuity of service.
Comply with company policies and align with the restaurant's culture by balancing hard work and fun.
